name: Noise Stories
description:
All music from album Noise Stories on brrwd:

https://brrwd.bandcamp.com/album/noise-stories

https://open.spotify.com/artist/5lqfZ9O99yDE8GwhlPUFKC?si=_tEfvMZATCqbvkNdf87eMw&dl_branch=1&nd=1

https://www.instagram.com/heycharlieabbott/

https://soundcloud.com/heycharlieabbott

CONTROLS:

Move using W,A,S,D

Move up and down using Q,E

Boost  movement using Shift

Adjust bloom using up and down arrow keys

Adjust noise warp using left and right arrow keys

Zone switch:  Space Bar

HINT:  If the game is choppy try CTRL/CMD -  Minus button to reduce browser zoom.  On Chrome this automatically reduces resolution and should increase frame rate.

Zone A music:  Waiting In The Lobby

Zone B music: Mountain Passing
